top.title: Pope Leo urges 'courage' to end Ukraine war in first Christmas address
top.summary: The pope also laments the condition of Palestinians during his address to worshippers at the Vatican.

top.title: Turkey detains 115 IS suspects 'planning New Year's attacks'
top.summary: Turkish authorities say firearms were seized and efforts to trace further suspected members are continuing.

top.title: Brazil ex-President Jair Bolsonaro's surgery for hernia 'successful'
top.summary: The former leader is serving a 27-year sentence for plotting a coup after losing the 2022 presidential election.

top.title: UK social media campaigners among five denied US visas
top.summary: The Trump administration bans five people who have called for tech regulation from entering the country.

top.title: TikTok removes AI weight loss ads from fake Boots account
top.summary: The adverts for prescription-only drugs showed healthcare professionals impersonating the British retailer.

top.title: Call of Duty co-creator Vince Zampella dies in California car crash
top.summary: The influential video game developer died after his car crashed and caught fire on a highway in Los Angeles.

title.#text: I re-created Google’s cute Gemini ad with my own kid’s stuffie, and I wish I hadn’t
